mapper.select:
SELECT t.FID, t.CFTASKID, t.CFCHECKMODELID, t.CFTYPEID, t.CFSEQ, t.CFKEYITEM, t.CFCHECKSTANDARD, t.CFNEEDTEXT, t.CFNEEDATTACHMENT, t.CFNEEDPICTURE, t.CFNEEDVIDEO, t.CFTYPENAME, t.ZYFFID, t.ZYFF FROM VW_SYX_ZLGL_DJX t WHERE (t.CFTASKID = #{item.taskId})
AND t.FID NOT IN (SELECT a.fid FROM VW_SYX_ZLGL_DJX a, (SELECT fid, CFCheckEntryID, CFCheckType, CFCheckResult, TO_CHAR(row_number() over(PARTITION BY CFCheckEntryID ORDER BY CFCheckDate DESC)) lev FROM CT_PRE_QualityCheckResult WHERE CFCheckType = #{item.cfCheckType} ) re WHERE re.lev = 1 AND re.CFCheckEntryID = a.fid AND re.CFCheckResult IN (1,3) AND a.cftaskid = #{item.taskId})
AND t.CFCHECKSTANDARD LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{item.checkStandard}),'%')
AND t.CFKEYITEM = 1
ORDER BY t.CFSEQ ASC
